generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved surface with visible lane markings, typical of a road used for vehicle traffic.
- sidewalk: A pedestrian walkway is visible on the left side of the image, adjacent to the building, and on the right side next to the stacked materials.
- building: The image contains multiple buildings on both sides of the street, including the one on the left with a stone facade and the one on the right with arched windows.
- fence: Orange and white construction barriers are present along the road, serving as a fence to demarcate construction zones.
- pole: Several poles are visible, including one with a traffic sign on the left side of the road and others supporting the construction barriers.
- traffic sign: A circular traffic sign with a red border and a blue background is visible on the left side of the road, mounted on a pole.
- vegetation: Trees are prominently visible in the image, both lining the street and in the background.
- terrain: A small patch of grass is visible on the left side of the road, adjacent to the sidewalk.
- sky: A portion of the sky is visible through the trees in the background, appearing clear and open.
- person: A person is visible standing near the construction barriers in the middle distance.
- car: A black car is parked on the left side of the road, and a white car is visible further down the road.
- truck: A white truck with a flatbed is parked on the right side of the road, with a trailer attached to it.
